title: Armchair
credit_line: Partial gift of the American Decorative Art 1900 Foundation and partial purchase with funds from Berdan Memorial Trust Fund, Martha Mack Lewis Fund, James L. Winokur Fund, and the following, by exchange: Gift of Mr. & Mrs. Sidney M. Feldman, Mrs. Paul B. Ernst, Mellon Financial Corporation, Frieda G. Shapira in memory of her husband Saul F. Shapira, Emmanuel and Mary Fellouzis and family, Mrs. John Berdan, Mary C. Hazard, Herman Miller, Inc., Kimball and Diane Nedved, and Gold Medal Inc.
provenance_text:
The Hollander Gallery Ltd. Milwaukee, Wisconsin, by auction, September 30, 1982
Daniel Wolf, New York, New York.

designed for "Rockledge," the home of Ernest L. King, Homer, Minnesota
